content: spring concept shawl by elizabeth finn materials yarn three colors of dk weight 50 gram skeins model used elsebeth lavold hempathy needle size us 5 gauge not important construction asymmetrical triangle designate each color with letters a b and c color c will show the most when worn in photo color a= magenta b=gold and c= aqua increases will always be on the right side after the first knit stitch when completing a section always end with knitting back so that the next section begins on the right side garter sections row 1 rs k1 kfb k to last st sl1 wyif row 2 ws knit to last st sl1 wyif lace sections row 1 rs k1 kfb k1 * yo k2tog repeat from * to last st sl1 wyif row 2 ws knit to last st sl1 wyif row 3 k1 kfb k1 * yo k2tog repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 sl1 wyif row 4 knit to last st sl1 wyif striping sections row 1 rs with new color k1 kfb k to last st sl1 wyif row 2 ws knit to last st sl1 wyif row 3 with old color k1 kfb k to last st sl1 wyif row 4 knit to last st sl1 wyif begin shawl with color a cast on 3 stitches row 1 rs k2 sl1 wyif row 2 ws k2 sl1 wyif with color a work row 1 & 2 of garter section 47 times 50 sts with color a work row 1 4 of lace section 6 times 62 sts with color a work row 1 & 2 of garter section 20 times 82 sts with colors b & a work row 1 4 of striping section 5 times 92 sts cut color a when done with color b work row 1 & 2 of garter section 10 times 102 sts with color b work row 1 4 of lace section 6 times 114 sts 1 spring concept shawl by elizabeth finn with color b work row 1 & 2 of garter section 5 times 119 sts with colors c & b work row 1 -4 of striping section 5 times 129 sts cut color b when done with color c work row 1 & 2 of garter section 7 times 136 sts with color c work row 1 -4 of lace section 6 times 148 sts with color c work row 1 & 2 of garter section 3 times 151 sts bind off work on right side using a very stretch bind off the bind off on the model k2 * sl both sts back to left needle k2tog tbl k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2tog tbl weave in ends and block if necessary key k = knit k2tog = knit 2 stitches together kfb = knit in front and back of same stitch one stitch increased wyif = bring yarn to front of work and slip the next stitch as if to purl from
